gpt_prompt: Please write a short explaination of the word '{word}' in the context of the original sentence: '{sentence}'. The definition of the word is: '{definition}'. Write an explaination that helps a Japanese beginner understand the word and how it is used in this context. Explain it in the same way a native would explain it to a 5 or 10 year old. Don't use any English, only use simpler Japanese.
